Name: Froggy's Farm & Friends
About the game: Help a friendly frog named Phroge as they farm, craft, and explore. Plant and grow crops for potion crafting, discover their unique magical qualities, and explore to uncover new friends! Features Clean up the landscape to save tadpoles Create potions to gain more resources to progress through the game faster Become the farming frog and bring your friends together About Development This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
